root.name: Chart Wars 3
root.description: Chart Wars 3 is the latest installment of the freeware music industry simulator. The game puts you as the boss of either a famous label or one you create. You must hire band, record,release and promote records and arrange tours, all while keeping the money coming. The game includes a lot of bands both known and less known,festivals,concert venues etc. Chart Wars 3 makes staff more important, your artist now have a private life with all the ups and downs that bring. The game also comes with a good editor so you can mod the game with new artist, bans, venues,festivals and more.
